WineMenu.title: Prosecco Extra Dry DOC Giacondi | Glera | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Pleasant and fruity on the nose.

WineMenu.title: Prosecco Brut Extra Dry DOC Montelvini | Glera
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Straw-yellow colour with greenish hues, has a fresh and highly fruity bouquet that reminisces acacia flowers, wisteria, pear, and wild apples.

WineMenu.title: Prosecco Brut Luna | Glera
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Fruity notes of golden apple, pear, and floral notes are refreshing and lovely.

WineMenu.title: Bellini | Fiorelli
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Notes of fruity grapefruit, peach, fresh sweet, and flavored intense.

WineMenu.title: Vino Spumante Brut Bottega White Gold | Glera
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Nose of fruity scents of golden apple, pear, and acacia flowers. Palate; fresh and crisp with floral notes.

WineMenu.title: Prosecco Bottega Gold | Glera
WineMenu.subTitle: Glass
WineMenu.description: Nose of fresh fruits with hints of mandarin, pineapple, and pear but also of floral hints of aromatic wisteria and aromatic herbs.

WineMenu.title: Pinot Grigio DOC | Giacondi | Sicily
WineMenu.subTitle: The pleasant fruity flavor of ripe pear in the nose.

WineMenu.title: Chardonnay Giacondi | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: Bright yellow color, intriguing floral notes. Pleasantly dry on the palate.

WineMenu.title: Trebbiano D'Abruzzo DOC | Abruzzo | 2023
WineMenu.subTitle: Aromas of delicate floral notes like acacia or white blossoms with hints of green apple, pear, and lemon zest. Light to medium bodied.

WineMenu.title: Gavi DOCG Bollina | Serravalle Scrivia | 2023
WineMenu.subTitle: Aromatic and bright wine with good aromatic persistence and a pleasant acidic and mineral note.

WineMenu.title: Cavit Riesling | Trento | 2023
WineMenu.subTitle: Refreshing light floral notes with aromas and flavors of apricot, peach, and pear — known for its balanced sweetness and acidity. Light-bodied.

WineMenu.title: Sauvignon Blanc Asiottus | Emilia Romagna
WineMenu.subTitle: Nose reveals a delicate blend of elderflower and gooseberry with hints of green bell pepper and lime. On the palate, it's medium-bodied with good refreshing acidity, featuring tones of white-fleshed fruits and green tea. Blend of Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc grapes.

WineMenu.title: Pinot Grigio Blush Zonin | Veneto | 2015
WineMenu.subTitle: Delicate and fine aromas with floral and fruity notes.

WineMenu.title: Rosé Santa Cristina Giardino | Sangiovese | Toscana | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: An intriguing and pleasant nose that offers floral and fruity notes of pink grapefruit, wild strawberries, and ripe apples, balanced with crisp freshness and a savory finish.

WineMenu.title: Prosecco DOC Rosé Brut Luna | Glera | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: Aromas of citrus, melon, almond, honey, and strawberry accompanied with floral notes.

WineMenu.title: Pinot Grigio Rosé San Vigilio | Lombardy | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: Lovely, light coppery pink color. Appealing lightly aromatic nose with red currant and cherry notes. Crisp palate with strawberry and peach fruit characters leading to a fresh and juicy finish.

WineMenu.title: Stil Rosé DOC Santa Margherita | Lombardy | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: The delicate pink color leads you to floral fragrances and fruity notes of orange with hints of lychee and ginger.

WineMenu.title: Manzoni Moscato Bottega Rosé | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: The aroma of roses and fruity notes of cherry, raspberries, ripe citrus fruits, and final spicy notes of sage.

WineMenu.title: Rosé Brut Gold Bottega | Pinot Noir | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: Nose of peach and summer berries with a palate that is fresh and crisp, with floral notes and flavors of strawberry and peach.

WineMenu.title: Barbera D’Asti DOC Balbi | 2021 | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: Full bodied, dry, round, and velvety.

WineMenu.title: Nebbiolo D’Alba DOC Balbi | 2019 | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: A full-bodied dry wine with velvety and harmonious flavors, typical light and wild strawberries.

WineMenu.title: Terdema Langhe Santa Stefano Belbo | Dolcetto | Barbera | Merlot | 2020 | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: Exhibits flavors of red fruits and dark fruits with an oaky finish.

WineMenu.title: Barbaresco Balbi | Nebbiolo | 2019 | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: Full-bodied with fruity, spicy, and leather notes with pleasing tannins.

WineMenu.title: Amarone Della Valpolicella DOCG | La Collina Dei Ciliegi | 2015 | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: A bold, smooth, and dry wine with notes of black fruits, black currants, blueberries, blackberries, red fruits, strawberries, and dried leaves.

WineMenu.title: Macion Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore DOC | La Collina Dei Ciliegi | 2019 | Veneto
WineMenu.subTitle: Aromas of small red fruits and dried flowers, followed by sophisticated balsamic notes. Velvety, harmonious, full, and round with lively freshness.

WineMenu.title: Chianti Giacondi | 2020 | Tuscany
WineMenu.subTitle: Lightly fruity and dry red with good acidity and slight tannin roughness.

WineMenu.title: Fattoria Le Maestrelle Santa Cristina | Shiraz | 2020 | Tuscany
WineMenu.subTitle: Complex and intense on the nose with notes of vanilla and coffee, balanced with aromas of mint, cocoa, and red fruits.

WineMenu.title: Brunello Di Montalcino DOCG | Sangiovese | 2018 | Tuscany
WineMenu.subTitle: Gorgeous earthy bouquet with spice (black pepper), dark fruit (cherry), and smoke notes.

WineMenu.title: Pinot Nero Mastri Venacoli | 2021 | Trentino
WineMenu.subTitle: Red ruby color with brick-red reflections, fruity nose, dry, harmonious and refined palate with pleasantly bitter undertones.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Merlot IGT Nespolino Rubicone | 2021 | Romagna
WineMenu.subTitle: Well-balanced red blend with intense ruby color. Notes of cherry and violet typical of Sangiovese, with herbs and chocolate aromas from Merlot.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese DOC Fico Grande | 2022 | Romagna
WineMenu.subTitle: Bright red with violet highlights, rich bouquet of red fruits, medium-bodied with delicate tannins.

WineMenu.title: Cabernet Sauvignon Giacondi | Forli
WineMenu.subTitle: Distinctive black currant aromas with intense ruby-red color.

WineMenu.title: Merlot Giacondi | Forli
WineMenu.subTitle: Typical ruby color with cherry flavors accentuated by herbal notes.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Superiore DOC Prugneto | 2021 | Romagna
WineMenu.subTitle: Notes of ripe fruits and aromas of cherry, licorice, raspberry, and violet.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Appassimento Tenuta Santodeno | 2022 | Romagna
WineMenu.subTitle: Intense ruby color and deep rich aromas of red fruits, blackberry jam, and spices. Full-bodied with soft tannins and balanced sweetness.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Cabernet Sauvignon IGT Borgo Dei Guidi Rubicone | 2019
WineMenu.subTitle: Soft & round wine with deep ruby red color and a long intense perfume of red fruits and blackberry jam, sweetened by spicy notes of licorice.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Superiore DOC Prugneto 1.5L | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: Notes of ripe fruits and aromas of cherry, licorice, raspberry, and violet.

WineMenu.title: Sangiovese Superiore DOC Prugneto 3L | 2021
WineMenu.subTitle: Notes of ripe fruits and aromas of cherry, licorice, raspberry, and violet.

WineMenu.title: Montepulciano Riserva DOC Tombacco Biferno | 2018 | Abruzzo
WineMenu.subTitle: A deep ruby red blend with violet reflections together with wild berries and well-integrated tannins with a long finish.

WineMenu.title: Montepulciano Truentum Sud D'Italia | 2021 | Abruzzo
WineMenu.subTitle: A deep ruby red blend with violet reflections together with wild berries and well-integrated tannins with a long finish.

WineMenu.title: Trentangeli DOC Castell Del Monte | Cabernet | Shiraz | 2018 | Puglia
WineMenu.subTitle: Blend of Aglianico, Shiraz, Cabernet Sauvignon with notes of blackberry, chocolate, vanilla, and earthy flavors.

WineMenu.title: Susco IGP San Marzano Salento | Susumaniello | 2020 | Puglia
WineMenu.subTitle: Floral and fruity bouquet with spicy delicate balsamic notes; intense ruby color.

WineMenu.title: Moët & Chandon Imperial Brut | France | Pinot Noir | Pinot Meunier | Chardonnay
WineMenu.subTitle: An elegant golden straw yellow color with green highlights and a sparkling bouquet.

WineMenu.title: Veuve Clicquot Brut | 2015 | France | Pinot Noir-Chardonnay | Pinot Meunier
WineMenu.subTitle: The Brut Yellow Label is known for its rich, complex flavor profile with notes of yellow and white fruits, citrus, and a touch of brioche.

WineMenu.title: Laurent-Perrier La Cuvée Brut | France | Pinot Noir | Chardonnay | Pinot Meunier
WineMenu.subTitle: A non-vintage champagne known for its elegant, refined style and delicate, crisp flavors.

WineMenu.title: Moscato DOCG Acquesi Asti | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: The bouquet consists of honey, peach, and a touch of citrus.

WineMenu.title: Chamdor Sparkling White | South Africa
WineMenu.subTitle: Alcohol-free sparkling grape juice made from the highest quality grapes to give you the sweet wine flavors without the alcohol.

WineMenu.title: Chamdor Sparkling Red | South Africa
WineMenu.subTitle: Alcohol-free sparkling grape juice made from the highest quality grapes to give you the sweet wine flavors without the alcohol.

WineMenu.title: Copenhagen Sparkling Tea Bla | Denmark | 2024
WineMenu.subTitle: Delicate aromas of jasmine, chamomile & a hint of citrus. Followed by a round taste from the careful selection of white teas & accompanied by good complexity & depth from the green teas.

WineMenu.title: Copenhagen Sparkling Tea Lysegron | Denmark | 2024
WineMenu.subTitle: Lively & elegant with notes of citrus, lemongrass, Earl Grey sencha & orange peel. Remarkable layers & a long-lasting hint of Darjeeling & green apples on the finish.

WineMenu.title: Barolo DOCG Ceretto | Nebbiolo | 2019 | Piemonte
WineMenu.subTitle: A full-bodied dry wine with velvety and harmonious flavors, typical light and wild strawberries.

WineMenu.title: Barbaresco DOCG Ceretto | Nebbiolo | 2020
WineMenu.subTitle: Soft, dry, rich in tannins harmonious, and full. Rich bouquet.

WineMenu.title: Solaia Antinori | Cabarnet Sauvignon | 2018
WineMenu.subTitle: An intense, deep ruby red color. Its nose is impressive with intense notes of dark,
